languages.text: Осколок К'тан был уничтожен. Тень катаклизма, вызванного освобождением древнего божества, более не затмевала Простор Коронус... по крайней мере, на какое-то время.
The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.
languages.original_text: Осколок К'тан был уничтожен. Тень катаклизма, вызванного освобождением древнего божества, более не затмевала Простор Коронус... по крайней мере, на какое-то время.

traits.locale_text: C'Tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of the calamity that could befall Koronus Expanse if the ancient god was ever to be set free was cleared... at least, for the time.
C'Tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of the calamity that could befall Koronus Expanse if the ancient god was ever to be set free was cleared... at least, for the time.
The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.
The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.
The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.
The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.

languages.text: 星神碎片被摧毁了。这位古神再也无法挣脱束缚，笼罩在科罗努斯扩区的灾厄阴影也随之消散……至少目前如此。
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.

traits.locale_text: 星神碎片被摧毁了。这位古神再也无法挣脱束缚，笼罩在科罗努斯扩区的灾厄阴影也随之消散……至少目前如此。

languages.text: Das C'tan-Fragment wurde zerstört. Der Schatten einer Katastrophe, welche die Koronus-Ausdehnung heimsuchten würde, sollte der uralte Gott je entfesselt werden, war verflogen ... zumindest vorübergehend.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.

traits.locale_text: Das C'tan-Fragment wurde zerstört. Der Schatten einer Katastrophe, welche die Ausdehnung heimsuchten würde, sollte der uralte Gott je entfesselt werden, war verflogen ... zumindest vorübergehend.

languages.text: L'Écharde C'tan fut détruite. Ainsi, les Étendues de Koronus n'avaient plus à craindre la calamité qui les menaçait si jamais le dieu ancien venait à être libéré... du moins, pour un temps.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.

traits.locale_text: L'Écharde C'tan fut détruite. Ainsi, les Étendues n’avaient plus à craindre la calamité qui les menaçait si jamais le dieu ancien venait à être libéré... du moins, pour un temps.

languages.text: El fragmento de C'tan fue destruido. La Extensión de Koronus estaba a salvo de la calamidad que supondría la liberación del dios ancestral... durante un tiempo, al menos.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.

traits.locale_text: El fragmento de C'tan fue destruido. La Extensión estaba a salvo de la calamidad que supondría la liberación del dios ancestral... durante un tiempo, al menos.

languages.text: ク＝タン・シャードは破壊された。古代の神の封印が解き放たれた時、コロヌス・エクスパンスを脅かす災厄の影は取り除かれた…少なくとも、しばらくの間は。
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.

traits.locale_text: ク＝タン・シャードは破壊された。古代の神の封印が解き放たれた時、エクスパンスを脅かす災厄の影は取り除かれた......少なくとも、しばらくの間は。

languages.text: C'tan Parçası yok edildi. Kadim tanrı zincirlerinden kurtulsaydı Koronus Enginliği'nin başına gelebilecek felaketler atlatıldı. En azından bir süreliğine.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard was destroyed. The shadow of calamity threatening the Koronus Expanse should the ancient god ever be unshackled had been lifted... at least, for a time.

traits.locale_text: C'tan Parçası yok edildi. Kadim tanrı zincirlerinden kurtulsaydı Koronus Enginliği'nin başına gelebilecek felaketler atlatıldı. En azından bir süreliğine.
